amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out certain major medical facility projects for which appropriations were made for fiscal year 2015.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1744 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1744 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3912-3915; text: CR S3915) To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out certain major medical facility projects for which appropriations were made for fiscal year 2015.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1744 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1744 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 1463.
